controller.songplayer

Interface SongPlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Player, SongInfosManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MidiSongPlayer, SampledSongPlayer

    public interface SongPlayer
extends Player, SongInfosManager
    A interface that represent a SingleSongPlayer (this interface is independent if the class that implements manages sampled sound or midi sound)
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SongPlayerState getState()
      Take the state
      boolean isActive()
      Return true if the song is playing

      • Methods inherited from interface controller.Player

        pause, play, stop

      • Methods inherited from interface controller.songplayer.SongInfosManager

        getDuration, getElapsedTime, setPosition
